title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-1.5 - Review of providers by the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-1.5 - Review of providers by the department

State Regulations
(a) The department may review and evaluate
the coursework or training offered by approved providers under this
section. (b) A determination by the
department that the coursework or training offered by an approved provider is
inadequate, incomplete, or otherwise unsatisfactory may result in the
termination of the provider's approved status. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-1.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
